Step 3: Add circular profiles On the same sketch, add four circular profiles as follows: * For the first loop, draw a circle with center point at [0.0375, 0.0375] and radius of 0.0232. Step 4: Scale and extrude the sketch Scale the sketch by a factor of 0.75, then extrude it by a distance of 0.075 along the normal direction of the sketch plane, and 0 in the opposite normal direction. Step 5: Record the description The dimensions of this part are approximately 0.75 in length, 0.75 in width, and 0.075 in height. The object has four edges and six faces. The front face is angled slightly to the right. The part can be described as a rectangular prism with a flat top and bottom, and a slightly angled front face.</description>
